bizPlanPriceUnit:
per team / month / billed annually
$20 billed monthly
faq1Answer: Once you register to BoxHero, you are granted with a 1-month free trial access to our business plan so that you can test out all our cool premium features. After the trial period, you can subscribe to our business plan if you want to continue using the features. If you think your free plan just works fine for your needs, you don’t need to make any payments.
faq1Question: Can I start off with the free single plan?
faq2Answer: When the free trial period is over, you will be automatically switched to the free plan. But don’t worry. Your the data will not be deleted. If you subscribe to the business plan, you can continue using BoxHero’s premium features.
faq2Question: What happens after the 1-month free trial period?
faq3Answer: BoxHero charges to the team for the plans that it is subscribed to. So the user does not need to make any payments.
faq3Question: Does each of the users need to pay?
faq4Answer: Since BoxHero charges to each of the team, if you are managing several teams, you will have to make payments for each team.
faq4Question: What happens if I need to manage several teams?
faq5Answer: Payments that have been already made are not refundable. However, if you cancel your subscription, you can still use BoxHero for the remaining period.

pageDescription: No Quotation Required, Free 1 month trial for the Business Plan without registering payment. Try it out first and pay later. Business Plans start at $20 per month for 10 members at 2000 item variations.
topDesc1Desc: No credit card required. Test now, decide later.
topDesc1Title: 1-month-free trial period to our premium business plan
